pilfer.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to steal things that are not worth much, especially from the place where you work
pilfer.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: She was sacked after being caught pilfering from the till.
pilfer.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to steal small amounts of things, or things that are not worth much, especially from an office, factory etc
pilfer.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: An employee has been charged with pilfering a set of automobile wheels.
